CodeExample.Title: Get the DirectoryRole's isSystem property
CodeExample.Summary: To get the DirectoryRole's isSystem property value, submit an HTTP GET request of the following syntax.
CodeExample.Request: GET /<version>/myOrganization/directoryRoles/<DirectoryRole.objectId>/isSystem HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose

Remarks.string: Alternatively, you can use the //myOrganization/directoryRoles/ URL to get the DirectoryRole entity first and then parse the result to retrieve the isSystem property value. In addition, you can append the ?$select=isSystem query option to the //myOrganization/directoryRoles/ entity-getting URL to retrieve the isSystem property value
